channel.title: [PI] Model help
channel.description:
idk if this is in the right section.. but i tried to add a winkman guitar i got the model from another tutorial, and when it was for a delta base so i had to convert it to PI, but when i add it my client freezes this is the regular code for delta
[code]if(i == 8101) // ITEM ID { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Play"; class8.anInt174 = 11134; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 11135; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 11135; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt181 = 850; // Zoom class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Winkman's Guitar"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "Whoa, Nice Guitar Dude!".getBytes(); // Item Examine }[/code]
This is the code i converted it to, idk if i did it right.. [code]case 8101: itemDef.name = "WinkMan's Guitar"; itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Equip"; itemDef.modelID = 11134; // Drop/Inv Model itemDef.modelZoom = 2000; // Zoom itemDef.modelRotation1 = 498; // Rotate up/down itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1300; // Rotate right/left itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.anInt204 = 0; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 11135; // Male Wield Model itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 11135; // Female Wield itemDef.description = "Whoa, Nice Guitar Dude!".getBytes(); // Item Examine break;[/code]

item.title: [PI] Model help
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

idk if this is in the right section… but i tried to add a winkman guitar i got the model from another tutorial, and when it was for a delta base so i had to convert it to PI, but when i add it my client freezes this is the regular code for delta

if(i == 8101) // ITEM ID { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Play"; class8.anInt174 = 11134; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 11135; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 11135; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt181 = 850; // Zoom class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Winkman's Guitar"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "Whoa, Nice Guitar Dude!".getBytes(); // Item Examine }

This is the code i converted it to, idk if i did it right…

case 8101: itemDef.name = "WinkMan's Guitar"; itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Equip"; itemDef.modelID = 11134; // Drop/Inv Model itemDef.modelZoom = 2000; // Zoom itemDef.modelRotation1 = 498; // Rotate up/down itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1300; // Rotate right/left itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.anInt204 = 0; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 11135; // Male Wield Model itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 11135; // Female Wield itemDef.description = "Whoa, Nice Guitar Dude!".getBytes(); // Item Examine break;

Read full topic
